title: Happy Fourth!
author: verias
text:
So, another holiday slides right in to interfere with our regularly scheduled story, but fret not! Seems Theresa and Chrys are out enjoying the fireworks too...kinda.

In the meantime, don't forget to vote for MotA on TWC, You can vote here, and there's a link waaaaaaaaaaay down at the bottom of the page. And we're trying to get the css to behave for the preview image.

And remember, you can see the fully colored incentive images (both the censored and uncensored versions) on our Patreon with a pledge as low as $3.

See you guys on Thursday!

Keith W.

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text:
Speaking ofFIREWORKS!:Took my granddaughters to their first-ever fireworks show on the FOurth, and set up and tried out the camera setup i plan to use for eclipse photos.See lotsa pictures here: http://forum.wapsisquare.com/viewtopic.php?f=9&t=3181Last edited by Guest
